main_definition: An individual who is hired by an organization to perform work in exchange for compensation.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A person working at a company or organization, typically on a salary or hourly basis.
meanings_and_examples.example: John works as an employee at ABC Corporation.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An individual who is part of the workforce and contributes to the productivity of a business or institution.
meanings_and_examples.example: The marketing department relies on its employees for successful campaigns.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A member of staff who has signed an employment contract with terms and conditions agreed upon by both parties.
meanings_and_examples.example: Her employee benefits include health insurance, paid vacation days, and retirement plans.
